items.quote: I was skeptical about the 'free' offer, but the homepage Benjamin delivered was better than what I paid another agency for last year. We immediately upgraded. Highly recommended!

items.quote: The speed is unbelievable. Having a professional starting point in just a few hours gave us the confidence to finally get our business online properly. The process was seamless.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? I've got answers. Here are some of the most common things people ask.

items.question: What's the catch with the 'Free Homepage'?
items.answer: There's no catch. I build you a high-quality, professional homepage to demonstrate my skills and earn your trust. If you love it, you can choose to upgrade to a full multi-page website. If not, there's absolutely no cost or obligation.

items.question: Do I need to provide my own content and images?
items.answer: For the free homepage, I'll use placeholder content and high-quality stock images if you don't have your own. For a full website project, I recommend providing your own content and photos to best represent your brand, but I can also help with copywriting and image sourcing as an additional service.

items.question: What about a domain name and web hosting?
items.answer: A domain name (e.g., yourbusiness.co.za) and web hosting are not included in the free homepage offer. When you decide to move forward with a full website, I can guide you through the process of purchasing them. They are essential for making your site live on the internet.

items.question: How long does a full website take to build?
items.answer: Once I have all your content, a 'Starter Site' typically takes 5-7 business days, and a 'Business Growth' site takes 7-14 business days. The timeline can vary depending on the complexity and the speed of feedback.

items.question: What happens after my support period ends?
items.answer: After your included support period, you can easily make simple text and image changes yourself. For peace of mind, I also offer affordable monthly website care plans that include hosting, security, backups, and ongoing support.

items.question: Can you help with a logo and branding?
items.answer: Absolutely! While not included in the standard website packages, I offer separate branding and logo design services to help create a cohesive and professional look for your business both online and offline.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm based virtually and serve clients everywhere. Have a specific question? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.whatsappPrefill: Hello! I'm interested in your web design services.
